author: James Quant
project_short_description: Databricks Asset Bundle project for building a deployable pipeline.

__prompts__.author: Author or team name
__prompts__.project_name: Stylized name or title of your project
__prompts__.project_slug: Root folder of your project (usually dash separated)
__prompts__.databricks_host: URL of databricks workspace for deployments
__prompts__.automated_sphinx_docs: Automated build and deployment of documentation with Sphinx
